outputs.output_descr: Institutional strengthening of the National Regulatory Authority (NRA) for the Unexploded Ordnance(UXO)/Mine Action Sector in Lao PDR for 2012-2015, for more effective provision of policy guidance, better coordination and regulation and steering of the UXO sector in support of achieving national development goals including the Lao specific 9th Millennium Development Goal (MDG) on UXO, implementing the national UXO sector strategy "Safe Path Forward II", and fulfilling international treaty obligations under the Convention on Cluster Munitions (CCM).

project_descr: Support to the Institutional Strengthening of the National Regulatory Authority (NRA) for the UXO/Mine Action Sector in Lao PDR for better coordination and regulation of the UXO (Unexploded Ordnance) sector, 2012-2015
project_title: Support to National Regulatory Authority for UXO in Laos
